title: Select, copy & paste multiple CSS rules and properties
body:
This feature would enable the selection of multiple rules and or properties in the styles view of the DOM Explorer. A set of actions (copy. enable, disable, delete, etc.) could then be applied to all of the selected items at once.

Proposed Design
- Enable shift (first and last) and ctrl (individual item) multi selection in the styles views
- In multi select mode only the following commands would be enabled: copy. enable, disable, and delete

comments.body: This would be very useful for comparing styles with a diff tool, e.g. from the 'computed' view
